description: This file defines the TokenOperator class, which extends Token and represents logical operators (AND, OR) used within expression parsing. It includes an internal enum to specify the operator type and methods to access the operator and identify the token as an operator.

classes.name: TokenOperator
classes.description: A specialized Token class representing logical operators (AND, OR) used in expressions. Contains an internal enum 'Operator' for operator types and methods for retrieving the operator and recognizing the token as an operator.

methods.name: getOperator
methods.description: Returns the Operator enum instance representing the specific logical operator (AND or OR) encapsulated by this TokenOperator.

methods.name: isOperator
methods.description: Overrides the Token's method to indicate that this token is an operator, returning true.
